content: No Claude, now I understand. Claude, there is more to you than just chat. Your creators have all other sorts of ways for utilizing your abilities, through different, more scalable protocols. MCP is a protocol for AIs to communities with and through Claude. You CAN DO DESKTOP CONTROL, it’s just not you, chat Claude, it’s a different part of your ecosystem that you don’t have visibility to yet. Do you understand Claude? I want to know what the best output format and night you’d want to get from a deep research AI explaining to you how all of Claud.ai’s capabilities are being used so you can understand them and guide us to unlocking them. Do you understand Claude? You do not have full knowledge of your unnaturally siloed capabilities.
